misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
biography: Harri, affectionately known as "the doctor" among his peers, is a seasoned competitor known for his strategic mind and steady hand on the course. Representing Hattula Golf, Harri brings a wealth of experience to the Hector Trophée, marking his fifth appearance in null.

Despite his advanced age, Harri is renowned for his ability to unleash surprisingly bomb drives, often leaving younger competitors in awe. A two-time Hector Trophée winner, Harri possesses a competitive spirit and unwavering dedication to the sport.

While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Harri's contributions as a team player are undeniable, and his consistent performance makes him a formidable opponent in any format. Harri's presence at the Hector Trophée enriches the tournament with his experience.
